name: D&D Character Sheet
description: Develop your character based on the Dungeons & Dragons tabletop role-playing game

attributes.name: Class & Level
attributes.description: The character's calling and way of being (e.g. Cleric or Fighter), alongside their experience level (e.g. Level 1)

attributes.name: Background
attributes.description: A representation of how the character lived before the adventure began (e.g. Noble, Sage, Urchin)

attributes.name: Race
attributes.description: The character's species, which influences their appearance and traits (e.g. Human, Dwarf, Elf)

attributes.name: Alignment
attributes.description: A representation of the character's ethical and moral values (e.g. lawful good, neutral, chaotic evil)

attributes.name: Experience Points
attributes.description: A numerical indicator of the character's experience as an adventurer, which increases by completing challenges

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in physical combat, carrying objects, and breaking physical barriers

attributes.name: Dexterity
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in dodging attacks, avoiding traps, and hiding from enemies

attributes.name: Constitution
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing health, endurance, and general survival ability

attributes.name: Intelligence
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing knowledge, cleverness, and logical reasoning skills

attributes.name: Wisdom
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing awareness, intuition, and ability to spot hidden traps and foes

attributes.name: Charisma
attributes.description: On a scale of 1-30, a score representing skill in social situations, likability, and general persuasiveness

attributes.name: Inspiration
attributes.description: A reward for behaving heroically or true to character or in a noteworthy manner that grants a one-time advantage

attributes.name: Proficiency Bonus
attributes.description: A number used to modify the effectiveness of certain dice rolls, checks, and saves

attributes.name: Saving Throws
attributes.description: A score representing the character's ability to resist or prevent a threat

attributes.name: Skills
attributes.description: The ability score of each character skill (e.g. acrobatics, arcana, medicine, religion, survival)

attributes.name: Passive Insight
attributes.description: A score representing the character's ability to passively discern the motivations and deceptions of others

attributes.name: Passive Perception
attributes.description: A score representing the character's ability to passively scan the environment for hidden objects, threats, and other details

attributes.name: Tool Proficiencies & Custom Skills
attributes.description: Tools the character is adept at using and the ability scores associated with their custom skills

attributes.name: Other Proficiencies & Languages
attributes.description: Weapons and armor the character is adept at using, as well as languages they speak

attributes.name: Armor Class
attributes.description: A score representing how difficult the character is to successfully attack

attributes.name: Initiative
attributes.description: A score representing the character's reaction time, which is equal to their Dexterity modifier

attributes.name: Speed
attributes.description: A score representing the character's raw speed, which is influenced by their Race

attributes.name: Hit Point Maximum
attributes.description: A score representing the character's greatest possible health

attributes.name: Current Hit Points
attributes.description: A score representing the character's current health

attributes.name: Temporary Hit Points
attributes.description: A score representing the character's current temporary health bonus, if any

attributes.name: Total (Hit Dice)
attributes.description: A term representing the number of hit dice the character has available to roll (based on Level)

attributes.name: Hit Dice
attributes.description: A term representing the dice the character rolls to determine their hit points (based on Class)

attributes.name: Death Saves
attributes.description: The location where you track how many successes and failures the character has on death saving throws

attributes.name: Attacks & Spellcasting
attributes.description: A list of the character's favorite melee and ranged weapons (or spells) and describe their attacks

attributes.name: Equipment
attributes.description: The character's inventory of gems, jewelry, magic items, and other loot acquired during the adventure

attributes.name: Currency
attributes.description: The character's copper (cp), silver (sp), electrum (ep), gold (gp), platinum (pp) and other forms of money

attributes.name: Total Weight
attributes.description: The amount of weight the character is currently carrying

attributes.name: Carrying Capacity
attributes.description: The amount of weight the character can carry (equal to the Strength score multiplied by 15)

attributes.name: Personality Traits
attributes.description: Two personality traits that identify the character (choose from the Player's Handbook or create your own)

attributes.name: Ideals
attributes.description: At least 1 ideal, or fundamental belief, that drives the character (choose from the Player's Handbook or create your own)

attributes.name: Bonds
attributes.description: One bond that ties the character's background to the adventure and drives their behavior (e.g. family, traditions, heirlooms)

attributes.name: Flaws
attributes.description: One flaw that could stop the character from achieving their goals (e.g. vices, fears, weaknesses)

attributes.name: Features & Traits
attributes.description: The character's major features (gained via their Class) and traits (gained via their Race)

attributes.name: Age
attributes.description: How old is the character?

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: What size is the character? (e.g. Tiny, Medium, Huge)

attributes.name: Height
attributes.description: How tall is the character?

attributes.name: Weight
attributes.description: How much does the character weigh?

attributes.name: Eyes
attributes.description: What is the character's eye color?

attributes.name: Skin
attributes.description: What is the character's skin color?

attributes.name: Hair
attributes.description: What is the character's hair color and style?

attributes.name: Character Appearance
attributes.description: Your character's appearance in detail, including images or sources of inspiration

attributes.name: Character Backstory
attributes.description: A summary of the characterâ€™s background prior to the adventure (e.g. origin, goals, conflicts, unique qualities)

attributes.name: Allies & Organizations
attributes.description: Friendly non-player characters (NPCs) and factions in which the character is a member (e.g. The Zhentarim)

attributes.name: Additional Features & Traits
attributes.description: The character's minor features (gained via their Class) and traits (gained via their Race)

attributes.name: Treasure
attributes.description: The character's inventory of loot and items of value which cannot be equipped, consumed, or modified (e.g. maps)

attributes.name: Spellcasting Class (Modifier)
attributes.description: The ability the character uses to cast spells, based on their Class (e.g. Charisma, Intelligence, Wisdom)

attributes.name: Spellcasting Ability
attributes.description: The number used to determine the effectiveness of a character's spells

attributes.name: Spell Save DC (Difficulty Class)
attributes.description: The number that targets must roll to resist the full impact of a spell (influenced by the Spellcasting Ability score)

attributes.name: Spell Attack Bonus
attributes.description: The number added to the d20 attack roll to determine if the spell hits the target (influenced by the Spellcasting Ability score)

attributes.name: Cantrips
attributes.description: The smaller spells the character can cast at will, which do not require spell slots (e.g. Mage Hand)

attributes.name: Spells - Level 1
attributes.description: 1st-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 2
attributes.description: 2nd-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 3
attributes.description: 3rd-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 4
attributes.description: 4th-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 5
attributes.description: 5th-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 6
attributes.description: 6th-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 7
attributes.description: 7th-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 8
attributes.description: 8th-level spells the character can cast

attributes.name: Spells - Level 9
attributes.description: 9th-level spells the character can cast
